about.title: A little about me
about.line1: Hi, I'm a freelance web developer specializing in high-quality complex web solutions for international small-medium businesses.
about.line2: I have experience building enterprise-grade web applications at JP Morgan, one of the largest banks in the world and a degree in software development for business (in progress).
about.line3: My aim is to build specialised solutions for the complex needs of modern businesses to help people thrive on the web.
about.line4: Through my services, I can develop you a well designed intuitive and professional web presence to allow you to do anything from eCommerce to blogs and everything in between to help grow your business.

1.title: Complex web application
1.desc: From simple sites, to blogs and stores using CMS, to complex applications with backend integration, I can build what your business needs.

2.title: Built for individual business needs
2.desc: I will work directly with you to build the perfect web solution for your business. Always hand built with cutting edge technology, no wordpress or pagebuilders.

3.title: Modern Design
3.desc: A modern business needs a proffesional unique design to create a brand and catch users attention. All designs work on all devices

4.title: Maintenence package
4.desc: An additional retainer package is also available for a monthly fee. Including maintenence, additional improvements, reports, training, and support.

5.title: SEO + Analytics
5.desc: All web sites are optimised for SEO results and have google analytics installed.

6.title: Hosting
6.desc: Hosting is set up on an excellant service with a generous free plan that can scale with your business.

1.title: Ross Neilson Web developer
1.desc: Freelance site made in react and gatsby with english and japanese localization
1.detailed: Modern designed landing page !Contact form !Lightweight high performance !Optimized SEO !Mobile friendly !All 90+ score in lighthouse !Progressive Web app (PWA) !Full Japanese and English localization

2.title: Tabi Traveler
2.desc: High-performance photography website with a portfolio, blog and shop
2.detailed: Dynamic landing page design with parallax scrolling effect  !Interactive portfolio for photos with interactive filters !A blog with CMS backend for easy content changes and additions !Shop with stripe for selling prints and automatic processing of orders !SEO optimization !Mobile friendly !High performance !Localization
